radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis at the lung bases without consolidation or pleural effusion; unremarkable liver, gallbladder, pancreas, spleen, adrenal glands, stomach, and duodenum; 2.1 cm hypodensity in the left kidney; 10 cm segment of asymmetric wall thickening in the descending colon with inflammatory change and focal perforation; small fluid collection measuring 1.1 x 1.5 x 2.6 cm.
